sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row class="d-flex justify-content-between mt-5">
            <v-col>
                <v-form @submit.prevent="searchProducts">
                    <v-row>
                        <v-col cols="auto">
                            <v-select
                             v-model="searchType"
                             :items="searchOptions"
                             item-title="text"
                             item-value="value"
                            >

                            </v-select>
                        </v-col>
                        <v-col>
                            <v-text-field
                            v-model="searchValue"
                            >
                                
                            </v-text-field>
                        </v-col>
                        <v-col cols="auto">검색</v-col>
                    </v-row>
                </v-form>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="auto">
                <v-btn>장바구니</v-btn>
                <v-btn>주문하기</v-btn>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="auto">
                <v-btn href="/product/create" color="success">상품등록</v-btn>
            </v-col>

        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default{
    data(){
        return{
            searchType: 'optional',
            searchOptions: [
                {text:"선택", value:'optional'},
                {text:"상품명", value: "name"},
                {text:"카테고리", value: "category"}
            ]
        }
    }
}
</script>
